ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Just ran through - along wall - and had some creature (I forget the name) that conned red to me cast a something darkness on me and hit me. Fortunately -
ygData.messageBody:
Just ran through - along wall - and had some creature (I forget the name)
that conned red to me cast a something darkness on me and hit me.
Fortunately - didn't stun me - and I kept running with Selo's and out ran
him.. So while it's not entirely safe - if you take the wall - and keep
running its probably safe. Now for non-bards without being grouped with a
bard and without Sow on them - might be a problem...

Slyde 26th Level
----- Original Message -----
From: Brangwen <brangwen@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 06, 1999 6:46 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kith Nerfed!!! Re: Undead drops in Kithicor


> From: "Brangwen" <brangwen@...>
>
> > Try it at night - you won't live to reach the other side of the zone.
It
> is
> > full of high level undead (30 to 45+) and things like enraged dread
wolves
> > and nearly all of it casts nasty spells and has a huge aggro radius -
it's
> a
> > BLAST!
> >
